document_data.caption: Cover of Forgotten Realms Conspectus.
document_data.title: Forgotten Realms Conspectus
document_data.author: [[Ed Greenwood]]
document_data.edition1: <!-- leave blank if there is only one -->
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Forgotten Realms Conspectus''''' is a fold-out map, time, and account of the ''[[Forgotten Realms]]'' setting published by [[TSR, Inc.]] in 1995. It includes a map of [[Faerûn]], a guide to ''Forgotten Realms'' products published around 1996, a brief timeline of the Realms with an account from the perspective of Alaundo the Seer by [[Ed Greenwood]], and accounts from the perspectives of Elminster, Drizzt Do'Urden, Khelben Arunsun, and the Simbul, with footnotes from [[Volo]] in a reversal of the usual order of things.

Index.Characters: :[[Alaundo]] • [[Elminster]] • [[Simbul]] • [[Lady Steel]] • [[Anastra Syluné Silverhand]] • [[Khelben Arunsun]] • [[Drizzt Do'Urden]] • [[Volothamp Geddarm]] • [[Azoun Obarskyr IV]]
